If you have a few minutes , do you mind checking out my new single ? I’m not looking for any handouts , just want feed back, guidance , and to form bonds and connect with more ppl within the industry because we all know that it’s who you know that dictates how far you go . Just check me out . Give me a chance I know your time important but I swear it won’t be a waste . Even if you have a preference when it comes to style . The talent is undeniable . https://soundcloud.com/kev2realmusic/midnight-drivin
